body.name: XCOOL USB C Cable, 4-in-1 USB-C Cable (3ft), 100W C to C Cable Fast Charging with Hook-and-Loop Fastener and Cable Management, Universal Charging Cable for MacBook, iPad, iPhone, Samsung, Gray
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 6 mins
features: Versatile 4-in-1 Design: Simplify your charging setup with our versatile 4-in-1 usb-c cable. Charge and sync your devices without the hassle of switching between multiple cables.

Multi-Device Charging Solution: This universal charging cable provides compatibility for all your charging needs, including an iOS-compatible port, USB-C port, USB-A port, and power adapter adaptability. Ideal as an all-in-one charging solution, it's suitable for a broad range of devices, such as iPhone 15/15 Pro/15 Pro Max/14/14 Plus/14 Pro/14 Pro Max/iPhone 13/13 Mini/13 Pro/13 Pro Max/iPhone 12/12 Mini/12 Pro/12 Pro Max/iPhone 11/SE Series; iPad Pro/Air/Mini; MacBook Pro 14"/MacBook Pro 16"/MacBook Air/MacBook Pro 13"; AirPods Series; Apple Watch Series; Galaxy S22/S22+/S22 Ultra/S21/S21+/S21 Ultra/S20/Note20; Switch, and more.
100W USB-C Fast Charging Cable: Power up your MacBook Pro 2021ʺ from 0% to 50% in just 30 minutes—that’s 42% faster than with a 60W charger and cable. (Charger not included).

Built to Last Multi-Head Charging Cable: Combined with zinc alloy and nylon braided for a 100,000-bend lifespan, the tough 4-in-1 charger is durable both inside and out. Whether you need to wrap it around your device or tuck it away neatly, our resilient and reliable 4-in-1 cord can handle it all.
Portable Phone Charger: With our USB-C to USB-C 3ft cable, enjoy a lightweight, compact solution for portability, office use, and neat short-distance charging.
Charge Without Taking Case off: Our intentional 2mm connector extension design enables easy charging without removing your case and protects both USB-C and iOS-compatible port.
High-Speed Data Transfers: Transfer movies, music, or more in seconds with 480 Mbps transfer speeds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Cool and Reliable!
reviews.reviewText: Having all the chargers I need in one cable is incredibly convenient. I've had it for a while, and it hasn't broken, so I'm happy with its durability. A reliable choice for those looking for a versatile and sturdy multi-charging cable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's great to have just one cable for nearly all my needs. The only thing missing is the micro USB.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great concept, but too bulky to fit with my phone case
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy cable, wide and braided. I like the ease of changing between the port types. It looks and feels well made.However, the lightning end does not stick up enough past the bulky square part it is mounted in, so I can't actually plug it into my phone without removing the phone from its case. I had bought this to keep in my car, and this won't work for me unless I modify my case. (It did work with my teen's case, so I gave it to zer, but now I still need to find a cable to use in the car.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a durable, flexible, fast-charging cable that will last a long time.
reviews.reviewText: This is a flat, anti-tangle, fast charging, 100,000 bend lifespan, 100 W, 6 foot cable that is capable of doing 480 Mbps data transfer. It has 2 different distinct ends. One end has a Lightning connector while the other end has a USB-Type A connector. However, if you push the botton on the bottom of each connector case, and slide the end up, each reveals a USB Type-C connection (underneath the covers). So one end is USB-Type A OR USB Type-C while the other end has Lightning OR USB Type-C. So basically you can charge any device (laptop, tablet, smart watch, power bank, or smartphone) that has a Lightning or USB Type-C port. There is no charging of devices that have outdated micro-USB ports. Here are the cable ends in graphical format.USB-Type A (outside) OR USB-Type C (inside) --------------------------------------------------------- USB-Type C (inside) OR Lightning (outside)The USB-Type C connector makes a nice tight connection with my Android device and it charges it up faster than other cables. I recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Complete junk, It broke after using it only 2 days.
reviews.reviewText: The part of the USB Type C that is inserted into your device, in my situation was the part that is inserted into my MacBook Pro broke off inside my computer. Luckily I was able to get it out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars does the job
reviews.reviewText: Nice options so that you can use it with pretty much any phone I just been using it a short time and it works well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great cable overall.I had a similar one from the Rolling Square brand which also had micro usb which this doesn't. I don't mind as I'm switching all my devices away from micro usb.I like that it can do both USB C and Lightning so that means I only have to carry 1 cable for charging my Macbook and iPhone. This also now supports 100W where they had an older version that only went upto 60W. 60W was also good enough for most devices but always better to have it higher just in case. It still only transfers 480mbps though.I like how it also came with some additional goodies such as extra cable ties and cable organizer that sticks on your desk.Overall a very good cable and good to have and travel with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars This isn't a bundle, it's only the cable this is a lie
reviews.reviewText: I bought this specifically because it was a bundle of the cable and flashlight and only got the cable, what the heck.Company wrote me in response to my review asserting it was my misunderstanding about the bundle. No, it's how you had it posted. It said bundle in the description. The picture selection I clicked on before hitting 'ad to cart' had both items in the picture. You needed to change how it was listed, not blame people for thinking they're getting the bundle when they click on the picture you put there that shows both items right on it. It wasn't my confusion, it's how it was listed. I see it's been changed since to make it much more clear, but I feel the company could have handled their reply to me better and acknowledged their part in how the item was posted.Aside from that, the cable is good and thick, but the end portion around the cable connection is rather large. For my iPad in the case, I cannot use the lightning cable connection because the housing around the connector is so large. Otherwise, haven't had any other problems so far.
